# Recluster pass 2
## Subset
```{r subset_seurat}
# multiplet barcodes
barcodes1 <- readRDS("../../rObjects/pass1_recluster_astrocytes_barcodes_to_remove.rds")
barcodes2 <- readRDS("../../rObjects/pass1_recluster_oligos_barcodes_to_remove.rds")
barcodes3 <- readRDS("../../rObjects/pass1_recluster_fibro_barcodes_to_remove.rds")
barcodes4 <- readRDS("../../rObjects/pass1_recluster_multiplets_barcodes_to_remove.rds")
barcodes5 <- readRDS("../../rObjects/pass1_recluster_neurons_barcodes_to_remove.rds")
barcodes <- c(barcodes1, barcodes2, barcodes3, barcodes4, barcodes5)
length(barcodes)

# create keep column
mouse_annotated$keep <- !colnames(mouse_annotated) %in% barcodes
table(mouse_annotated$keep)
DimPlot(mouse_annotated, shuffle = TRUE, group.by = "keep")

# subset on cell types of interest
sub <- subset(mouse_annotated, keep == TRUE)
```

## Filter genes
```{r filter_genes}
# filter genes
counts <- GetAssayData(object = sub, layer = "counts", assay = "RNA")
nonzero <- counts > 0  # produces logical
keep <- Matrix::rowSums(nonzero) >= 10  # sum the true/false
counts.filtered <- counts[keep,]  # keep certain genes

# create seurat object
options(Seurat.object.assay.calcn = TRUE)
mouse <- CreateSeuratObject(counts.filtered)

# add metadata
mouse <- AddMetaData(mouse, metadata = sub@meta.data[colnames(mouse), 4:27])

# print features removed
print(paste0(dim(counts)[1] - dim(counts.filtered)[1], " features removed"))

# cleanup data
remove(counts,counts.filtered,nonzero,sub,mouse_annotated)
```

## SCTransform
```{r sctransform, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# split
mouse_split <- SplitObject(mouse, split.by = "sample_id")

# transform
options(future.globals.maxSize = 20000 * 1024^2)  # 20 GB
mouse_split <- lapply(mouse_split, SCTransform)

# get shared featured
shared_features <- SelectIntegrationFeatures(mouse_split)

# merge
mouse_merged <- merge(mouse_split[[1]], y = mouse_split[-1])

# set default assay
DefaultAssay(mouse_merged) <- "SCT"

# set variable features
VariableFeatures(mouse_merged) <- shared_features

# save
saveRDS(mouse_merged, 
        file = "../../rObjects/pass2_sct_seurat_obj.rds",
        compress = FALSE)
remove(mouse, mouse_split)
gc()
```

## UMAP and Cluster
```{r umap_and_cluster, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# run UMAP
mouse_unannotated <- RunUMAP(mouse_integrated,
                             dims = 1:13,
                             min.dist = 0.2,
                             n.neighbors = 40,
                             seed.use = 42,
                             reduction = "harmony",
                             n.components = 3)

# Determine the K-nearest neighbor graph
mouse_unannotated <- FindNeighbors(object = mouse_unannotated,
                                   assay = "SCT",
                                   reduction = "harmony",
                                   dims = 1:13)

# Determine the clusters for various resolutions
mouse_unannotated <- FindClusters(object = mouse_unannotated,
                                  algorithm = 1,
                                  resolution = 0.3)

# Set default assay and normalize for visualization
mouse_unannotated <- JoinLayers(mouse_unannotated, assay = "RNA")
DefaultAssay(mouse_unannotated) <- "RNA"
mouse_unannotated <- NormalizeData(mouse_unannotated)

# save
saveRDS(mouse_unannotated, 
        file = "../../rObjects/pass2_unannotated_seurat_obj.rds",
        compress = FALSE)
```

  "Ptprb", "Cldn5", "Flt1",                           # Endothelial

  "Col1a1", "Col1a2", "Dcn",                          # Fibroblast
  "Cfap44", "Spag16",                                 # Ependymal
  "Mog", "Opalin", "Mal", "Mag", "Mbp",               # Oligodendrocytes
  "Pdgfra", "Cspg4", "Olig1", "Olig2", "Tnr",         # OPCs
  "Syt1", "Snap25", "Rbfox3",                         # Neurons

## Assign idetities
```{r assign_identities}
new_cluster_names <- c(
  "0" = "Gad2",
  "1" = "Astrocytes",
  "2" = "Slc17a7",
  "3" = "Slc17a7",
  "4" = "Gad2",
  "5" = "Slc17a7",
  "6" = "Slc17a7",
  "7" = "Slc17a7",
  "8" = "Oligodendrocytes",
  "9" = "Slc17a6",
  "10" = "Slc17a7",
  "11" = "Astrocytes",
  "12" = "Multiplets 1",
  "13" = "OPCs",
  "14" = "Gad2",
  "15" = "Slc17a7",
  "16" = "Slc17a7 Slc17a6",
  "17" = "Gad2",
  "18_0" = "Multiplets 2",
  "18_1" = "Choroid",
  "18_2" = "Choroid",
  "18_3" = "Choroid",
  "19" = "Slc17a7 Slc17a6",
  "20" = "Slc17a7",
  "21" = "Slc17a7 Slc17a6",
  "22" = "Differentiating OPCs",
  "23" = "Microglia",
  "24" = "Fibro-Endo",
  "25" = "Snap25- Gad2+"
)

# set new idents
mouse_annotated <- RenameIdents(mouse_unannotated, new_cluster_names)
mouse_annotated$annotated_clusters <- Idents(mouse_annotated)

# set level
mouse_annotated$annotated_clusters <- factor(mouse_annotated$annotated_clusters,
                                  levels = c("Astrocytes",
                                             "Microglia",
                                             "Choroid",
                                             "Gad2",
                                             "Slc17a6",
                                             "Slc17a7 Slc17a6",
                                             "Slc17a7",
                                             "OPCs",
                                             "Differentiating OPCs",
                                             "Oligodendrocytes",
                                             "Fibro-Endo",
                                             "Snap25- Gad2+",
                                             "Multiplets 1",
                                             "Multiplets 2"))
Idents(mouse_annotated) <- "annotated_clusters"

# save
saveRDS(mouse_annotated, 
        file = "../../rObjects/pass2_annotated_seurat_obj.rds",
        compress = FALSE)
```
